content.text: 0) Place shortbread cookies on a baking sheet or tray.
1) In a small saucepan over medium-low heat, melt caramels in water, stirring frequently.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "melt"@45:49 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "caramels"@50:58 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "water"@62:67 / FOOD )
		:simultaneous ( ac-1-1 "stirring"@69:77 / AC )
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a small saucepan"@6:22 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-1-0 "medium-low heat"@28:43 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Spoon a thin line of caramel over each cookie.
3) Place cookies in refrigerator until caramel is set.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( "cookies"@9:16 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-3-0 "refrigerator"@20:32 / TOOL )
		:until ( cond-3-0 "until caramel is set"@33:53 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Line baking sheets or trays with waxed paper.
5) In a double boiler over simmering water, melt chocolate.
6) Dip cookies in chocolate one at a time, tapping against the side of the bowl to remove excess.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Dip"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( "cookies"@7:14 / FOOD )
		:simultaneous ( ac-6-1 "tapping"@43:50 / AC
			:prp ( purp-6-0 "to remove excess"@80:96 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
			:ppt ( tool-6-0 "the side of the bowl"@59:79 / TOOL )
		)
		:gol ( "chocolate"@18:27 / FOOD )
		:heat ( "one at a time"@28:41 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Place on prepared sheets and let rest at room temperature several hours, until set.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:gol ( tool-7-0 "prepared sheets"@12:27 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-7-1 "rest"@36:40 / AC
		:heat ( temp-7-0 "room temperature"@44:60 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-7-0 "several hours"@61:74 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-7-0 "until set"@76:85 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
